attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should it be just Londoners paying extra council tax. The olympics could benefit the whole country. Many sports in the olympics will take place outside London yet the various councils are not charging extra council tax. If the whole country payed extra it would reduce the extra Londoners pay and therefore bring in more revenue to hold a successful olympics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
